document.full_text: david ferrer advanced to the semifinals of the monte carlo masters by beating 11th-seeded viktor troicki of serbia 6-3, 6-3 on friday.
document.title: nadal, federer into quarters in monte carlo
lines_and_colors: david ferrer advanced to the semifinals of the monte carlo masters by beating 11th-seeded viktor troicki of serbia 6-3, 6-3 on friday.
